動物用藥品名稱: 有泉APP豬放線桿菌不活化菌苗
效能(適應症): 預防豬嗜血桿菌性胸膜肺炎。
ingredients: APP SEROTYPE 1      MIN. 1.32 X 10^9 GERMSAPP SEROTYPE 2      MIN. 1.32 X 10^9 GERMSAPP SEROTYPE 4      MIN. 0.28 X 10^9 GERMSAPP SEROTYPE 5B     MIN. 0.28 X 10^9 GERMSHEMOLYSIN EQ. TO AT LEAST 60 HAEMOLYTIC UNITSALUMINUM HYDROXIDE    0.4%CHLOROCRESOL          0.09%
